---
title: "SPP for ISM"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
ISM <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/ISM.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
ism <- ts(ISM[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+65/365.25)
ism %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(ism))
```

```{r}
training_ism <- subset(ism, end=length(ism)-3)
test_ism <- subset(ism, start=length(ism)-2)
fc_training_ism<-forecast(training_ism)
fc_training_ism %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_ism)
```

```{r}
fc_training_ism
```

```{r}
fc_ism<-forecast(ism)
fc_ism %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_ism
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_ism)
```
